activities: MDinTouch International Inc. (MDiT) is an exchange hub for medical information, facilitating rapid communication between different healthcare providers, medical transcriptionists and payors. Data from European customers such as Health Care Providers and Medical Transcription Organizations is being transferred and processed in MDiT's Data Centers in the US, as a part of normal business responsibilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
